## Data Visualization

```{r}
#| echo: false
# Your plots will inherit your website's styling
library(ggplot2)

# Example plot using your color palette
ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt, mpg)) +
  geom_point(color = "#b74a58") +  # muted-pink
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Sample Plot",
       subtitle = "Using your website colors") +
  theme(
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#e6f1f2", color = NA),  # misty-sky
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#e6f1f2", color = NA),
    text = element_text(family = "Karla", color = "#3a5d65"),  # deep-forest
    plot.title = element_text(family = "Quicksand", color = "#7a2c29")  # deep-red
  )
```
